body: I haven't been on for Months don't play MC much anymore. Though I cam back to see what I've missed out. I do assume there are new members here. If you'd like to know anything about me feel free to ask. If you're not sure just fire it the comments.

title: AMA Kev

replies.body:
Hey, welcome back! ;D

What is your skin? (assuming it's Venom from Spiderman)
What was the last thing you ate?
What color shirt are you wearing?
